description: The latest version of Elastic Stack, a popular data search and analysis tool, has added features for natural language processing (NLP). This article explains the process of analyzing user reviews of Google Play Store collected through crawling via Text Classification by applying a language model trained with PyTorch to Elasticsearch.

related_urls.label: Leveraging PyTorch Natural Language Processing Models in the Elastic Stack

speakers: Kim Jong-min, Park Yu-na, Hwang Han-gyeol
title: Leveraging PyTorch Natural Language Processing Models in the Elastic Stack
